00029         public Fields initFields()
00030         {
00031                 FieldString moduleName = new FieldString("Module", "moduleName");
00032                 moduleName.setNaturalKey(true);
00033 
00034                 FieldString entityName = new FieldString("Entité", "entityName");
00035                 entityName.setNaturalKey(true);
00036 
00037                 FieldString actionName = new FieldString("Action", "actionName");
00038                 actionName.setNaturalKey(true);
00039 
00040                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldsInit = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00041                 fieldsInit.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00042                 fieldsInit.add(moduleName);
00043                 fieldsInit.add(entityName);
00044                 fieldsInit.add(actionName);
00045 
00046                 return new Fields(fieldsInit);
00047         }
